caption.center: TERANCE LEON JACKSON, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Polk County, Harvey A. Kornstein, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See Daniels v. State, 825 So. 2d 499 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002); Graham v. State, 825 So. 2d 492 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002).
DAVIS, VILLANTI, and WALLACE, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
